text: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا

translation.en: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned
translation.id: Dan Rasul (Muhammad) berkata, "Ya Tuhanku, sesungguhnya kaumku telah menjadikan Alquran ini diabaikan
